channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Legislative majorities giving one party all the power are in play in several states
item.description: A behind-the-scenes battle is underway between Democrats and Republicans for supermajority control of state legislatures across the country.

item.title: 1 dead and 9 wounded when groups exchange gunfire after Tennessee university celebration
item.description: Police say gunfire broke out among a crowd near a Tennessee university celebrating homecoming. They say one person was killed and nine others were injured.

item.title: North Carolina football player Tylee Craft dies from rare lung cancer at 23
item.description: North Carolina football player Tylee Craft has died from a rare form of lung cancer. Coach Mack Brown made the announcement in his postgame news conference following the Tar Heelsâ€™ loss to Georgia Tech on Saturday.
